name: Golovchenko.GitHub.io
body:
###Yevgeniy Golovchenko

 [About](http://golovchenko.github.io/index.html)/ [Projects ](http://golovchenko.github.io/projects.html)/ [Contact](http://golovchenko.github.io/contact.html)
___
I am a master's student at the [Department of Sociology](http://www.sociology.ku.dk/), University of Copenhagen. My research is mainly focused on internet and politics. I am greatly interested in applying social network analysis, digital methods and any innovative approach within social sciences. 

To get an overview of my work see Projects.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
